BagItProfile_allowFetchTxt_help: Are fetch.txt files allowed? These files contain URLs of files that should be part of the bag. DART does not yet support packaging or validating fetch.txt files.
BagItProfile_allowMiscTopLevelFiles_help: Can the bag contain files in the top-level directory other than manifests, tag manifests, and standard tag files like bagit.txt and bag-info.txt?
BagItProfile_allowMiscDirectories_help: Can the bag contain directories other than 'data' in the top-level directory?
UploadTarget_port_help: The port to connect to on the remote server. You can usually leave this blank.
UploadTarget_bucket_help: The name of the bucket or default folder into which items should be uploaded.
UploadTarget_login_help: The login name or email address used to connect to the remote server. For S3 connections, this can be an AWS access key ID.
UploadTarget_password_help: The password used to connect to the remote server. For S3 connections, this can be the AWS secret access key.
UploadTarget_loginExtra_help: Leave this blank unless otherwise instructed.
